name: ken Krdld@hotmail.com
text: The place was real clean. The people very friendly and helpful. They had a nice salad bar. I gave it a three just because of personal taste and preference of pizza.  There were plenty of toppings  but very little sauce so therefore very dry â€¦More

name: louis gonzalez
text: This place is delicious!! The pizza has great flavor/texture and an assortment of toppings. The pizza is made to order and is very fresh. This location is easy to find, located next to the HEB. The restaurant has plenty of seating for walk â€¦More

name: Tammy Golden
text: The salad and pizza bar are excellent. Good place to go and enjoy visiting with family and friends. While you enjoy a meal.

name: Lydia Gonzales
text: The Sampler has been my favorite for 30 years. I hope they never close!! We will hunt Mr. Gatti's down for their scrumptious buffet. Flavors that hit your taste buds to tell you "You're home again!!"

name: Dick Steele
text: This was a nice New place super clean. The selection of game's is ok it suits the small children who visit but the middle and up well hopefully you like playing on the little tyke's games! The buffet was fresh and hot it was slammed busy â€¦More

name: Staci Tolbert
text: The pasta was dry & sauce was all not even warm as the pizza was not warm & not stocked. The salad bar was good but not well stocked. The cheese bread was good. It was much better last time I ate there.

name: Brenda Spencer
text: Huge dining and arcade room! Staff were more than nice! Very helpful and pleasant and attentive! Clean and very organized and following Covid regulations!

name: David Taylor
text: No buffet. Drove into town for it and We felt like we had been overcharged for just one pizza and 2 drinks. (Almost the prize for a buffet if not more) While eating and conversating with friends, 1 of the employees was mopping and the mop â€¦More

name: Mitzi Logan
text: Got the large Florentine.  Amazing. Service is wonderful and the pizza is FRESH. Love love this place!

name: justine courtney
text: Pizza is awesome! Smoked provolone cheese! Best pizza in Texas!

name: Mullexwing
text: We had stopped here back in 2016, and I remember it being better.  The place was packed when we arrived, but it was also Memorial day weekend.  We sat in the back in the arcade, and the AC wasn't working very well.  Was set for 77 and â€¦More

text: The pizza is good, the salad bar has multiple choices, and the people are very nice

name: Michael Thompson
text: Good pizza. Good service. Like their new location.

name: Theresa Bowers
text: Ampable, Convenient parking,clean interior,good and friendly service.Being from Austin & coming here, I believe they're over priced for the quantity of product produced,Do NOT delivere,close really early, otherwise I would give it a (5) star! Hope this review helps all the way around!!

name: Rey Navejas
text: Place looks great. First time there since they changed locations. Very spacious, clean and organized. They have good food for lunch rush going on. Best salad bar within a 40 Mile radius in MY opinion. Great pizza.

name: Randall McMinn
text: Great place to eat, best salad bar in Texas

name: Frilly Dishes
text: Nice and clean, decent selection of games in the arcade.

name: Teresa Calley
text: First time I've seen their new place.  Looks very nice.  Got there towards the end of the buffet so selection was a little less but it was good.  Wish they would put up a sign at the street.  If you are coming from Hwy 29 and going towards â€¦More

name: Anthony Orgitano
text: My favorite pizza there is a thin crust sampler with extra sauce and extra cheese.  I can't wait until their buffet reopens because it is better than Gatti Town.  Biggest salad bar I have ever seen with an excellent selection of pizza and pasta.

name: Jim and brandy Martin
text: Wonderful food wonderful place wonderful people..

name: Josue Moreno
text: It was a great birthday party place! The kids had a blast, only complaint is that you can't reserve the party room and we had to share with other people, also there were no party pack deals. But great place!

name: Walter Robbins
text:
Soo we were sooo happy to find a mr Gattiâ€™s pizza on our route to and from Austin there in kingsland but now I know why they are all going out of business
1st time we waited in the parking lot 45 min for our lg sampler the girl asked â€¦More

name: Lisa Escamilla
text: Kids had fun. This was our first visit to this location and I had already let cashier know for some other reason. We arrived close to 2 for a party, paid for 3 buffets and I had only had my salad when a worker told us the buffet was closing â€¦More

name: Steve L.
text: Pizza is awesome - only drawback:  when you google Mr. Gatti's Kingsland, it brings up a site with a coupon, and they say it isn't there coupon, so they don't accept it, even though you can clearly see their store address above the coupon - â€¦More

name: OPTIMUSs_JEDI
text: The new location is stunning ! The gorgeous employees are really well mannered and the quality of food has not gone down at all ! The parking lot really needs some more lights at night and the left side where thereâ€™s bigger rocks should â€¦More

name: Jared McBride
text: Great service and salad bar is huge.

name: Gregory Zimmerman
text: Pizza was mainly dry and doe"y". Not enough sauce or cheese or topping. Would not recommend this pizza to anyone. You can get better pizza from the freezer section of the grocery store.

name: Melissa Hutton
text: So fun. Great new games

name: Jeremy Vick
text: Wonderful service great atmosphere, so glad they opened back their buffet!

name: The Bionic Bandit
text: Love the new location!  Fantastic improvement with the inside of the establishment as well.  Very well done and my hat is off to the owners for making this move!  I highly recommend this place for all of your eating pleasures...thanks Kingsland for the upgrade!

name: Scott O'Connor
text:
Buffet was blah, but we went in within an hour of closing time.

They left the salad bar 15 extra minutes for us. â€¦More

name: shells Yeah
text: Love their pizza, willing to drive 25 minutes for it! Wish they'd put one back in Marble Falls. But this on is all new and has a great game room.

text: Great pizza and salad bar.

name: aj robison
text: Love this place.  All you can eat pizza , salad bar,  pasta and dessert with a drink for $11.00? Yes please.  They also give a dollar discount for senior citizens. â€¦More

name: William Shell
text: Salae bar good. Pizza just OK. Did not want to waste what little I had left. Had owner start his spill about not allowing a small container for a little left over salad. Will not go again.

name: David Monroe
text: It's only four stars due to location. It's ample for where it's at with games for children to teens. The food is likable and good for what it is.

name: Melody Holland
text: We loved the new location & all the new additions that were offered like game room for the kids. Bigger salad bar & more tables. Perfect for our group out for the evening from camping. We designed our own pizzas & loved every slice!!!

name: Charlene Bannister
text: The building they are in right now is old but the bathrooms always smell like bleach and they strive very hard to keep it clean as buisy as they get. I can't wait till they open the bigger new location up right down the street from them! I â€¦More

name: ENstudios
text: Good for large gatherings, food is hit or miss

name: Blake Palmer
text: Had a fantastic time! Never felt so welcomed! Steve Rogers accommodated all of our needs! He even played some great music! 10/10 would go back.

text: Got sick after going there not sure what's up with that

name: Sandra Nixon
text: Itâ€™s sad because I enjoy the food here. But today when I went the employeeâ€™s were eating right of the buffet and then go straight back to making pizza again. And then one guy was itching his face like crazy while making pizza. I definitely think they should be wearing gloves and have hand washing time and maybe a lunch break.

name: Lynsie Ruzicka
text: The game room is the reason we went. Maybe it was an off day but I thought the pizza was very dull. 3 stars for the game room entertaining my 3 yo.

text: They had some really good thin crust style pizzas on the buffet this evening.

name: Jeremy Brackin
text: It looks like someone ate my pizza they couldnâ€™t even make a pepperoni pizza correct after spending $40 on pizza I returned all of it never have I had a bad pizza from this place till they changed location. What is on the menu is not what you will get, beautiful concrete floors though.

text: Good food, efficient and friendly staff. Good deals for seniors. Will keep going back.

name: Fran Stephens
text: First time @ the new location. An incredible salad bar even @ 8pm. Also got a small spaghetti w/meat sauce. Yummy!

name: Betty Bielser
text: The salad bar at the Kingsland location is the best in town. Always fresh and well stocked. We always order our favorite vegetarian pizza and when it's ready, they bring a plateful to our table. Makes us feel special. Looking forward to the grand opening of their new location. Thanks Joe.

name: Roxanne Clark
text: We went for the buffet, I was kinda disappointed in the lack of variety of pizza.  About 90% had jalapenos on it, so there was just a few to choose from.  For the price they charge you would think they would have real bacon on the salad bar!!!

name: Stephen Buntrock
text: Worst pizza ever! Even cheap frozen pizza is better! Sauce tastes like ketchup. Insensitive staff, got the order wrong, of course, said a 25 minute wait for the correct order.
